npcs.name: Wolves
npcs.description: A pack of wolves searching for their next meal.

npcs.name: Guard
npcs.description: There seems to be a large guard sitting by the door

npcs.name: Cave Gnomes
npcs.description: winged gnome-like beings fly around the halls

npcs.name: Lizardmen
npcs.description: A large reptilian humanoid stands before you

npcs.name: The old god of fear and hunger
npcs.description: the Ancient One rushes towards you , a pure creature with a soul that radiates the light of an older god

npcs.name: Lord of The Flies
npcs.description: A strange, soulless creature wanders the basement looking for any victims to snatch and take away

npcs.name: wandering nard
npcs.description: You see a small humanoid creature on the ground, who knows what horrors its committed

npcs.name: Mr. B
npcs.description: Mr. B sits quietly while polishing his trumpet, you can feel his immense aura

npcs.name: remains of Manocha
npcs.description: The remains of a lengendary punker rests here, his lingering spirit is ready to punk one last time

npcs.name: yellow mage
npcs.description: a Yellow mage is worshiping and channeling the blood magic of the old god of destruction, beware.

npcs.name: Maggots
npcs.description: disgusting green maggots crawl onto your feet
